tit.e: Ke-shima Island (an island in Maizuru City)
Ke-shima Island (an island in Maizuru City)

sen.j: 毛島（けしま）は、京都府舞鶴市に存在する島である。
sen.e: Ke-shima Island is an island that belongs to Maizuru City in Kyoto Prefecture.
Ke-shima Island is an island that belongs to Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Ke-shima Island is an island that belongs to Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

tit.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 成生岬から東方沖約1キロメートル の日本海上にある、京都府最大の離島で、大きさは周囲約4キロメートル。
sen.e: It is four kilometers about, the largest island in Kyoto Prefecture, and it is in Japan Sea, one kilometer off the east of Naryu-misaki Cape.
It is the largest remote island in Kyoto Prefecture, located in Japan Sea, one kilometer off the east of Naryu-misaki Cape, and the circumference of the island with about four kilometers.
It is the largest remote island in Kyoto Prefecture, located in Japan Sea, one kilometer off the east of Naryu-misaki Cape, and the circumference of the island with about four kilometers.

sen.j: かつては、有人島であったが、現在は無人島となっている。
sen.e: Once it had residents, however, now it is a desert island.
Once it had residents, however, now it is a desert island.
Once it had residents, however, now it is a desert island.

sen.j: 釣りスポットとして知られている。
sen.e: It is well known as a fishing spot.
It is well known as a fishing spot.
It is well known as a fishing spot.
